Title: Generate XSS Cookie Theft

Procedure:
1. Open a new page in your web browser (e.g., Google Chrome on Windows or Safari on Mac).
2. Once the page loads, right click on any text box in the page (e.g., HTML text input boxes or fields) and select "inspect element."
3. Look for the attribute value of id="id_of_input" and select it to reveal the actual value.
4. Copy this value by using Ctrl+C or selecting all items (e.g., Shift+Command+C) and then pasting it to your clipboard (e.g., Cmd+V
